content.rendered:
We value our patients’ experience at Tropea Chiropractic Inc. If you are currently a patient, please feel free to submit your review to one of our social media pages or email us on our contact page.

Dr. Tony Tropea

Reviews From Our Satisfied Patients

  • “I’m constantly impressed with the results from Dr. Tony. The depth of his knowledge and the treatments provided to relieve my back pain are impressive — l leave a treatment feeling refreshed. Not only does Dr. Tony take the time to answer your questions and explain the treatments, but he truly care

    …

    s about your overall health! He shares excellent tips, stretches, and exercises to help you get healthy too. Dr. Tony is genuinely in the business of healing people.“

    Show More

    – Ken G.

  • “Dr. T keeps me performing. I drive all the way from the city to see him. I have seen several providers over the years and I have not found anyone who spends as much time or do as much effort with me as Dr. Tony. So, thank you for all you do.“

    – Yehya E.

  • “I have been coming to Tropea clinic for two years and I really like how Dr. Tony works. He have different techniques depending on your injury.“

    – Xymena G.

  • “I highly recommend Dr Tropea, he is so amazingly awesome on his job whatever he did helped me a lot , I was having a lot of pain on my neck and shoulders I went twice And I felt much better in only two sessions , I canâ€™t wait to go again , thank you Doctor.“

    – Hilda S.

  • “I’m constantly impressed with the results from Dr. Tony. The depth of his knowledge and the treatments provided to relieve my back pain are impressive — l leave a treatment feeling refreshed. Not only does Dr. Tony take the time to answer your questions and explain the treatments, but he truly care

    …

    s about your overall health! He shares excellent tips, stretches, and exercises to help you get healthy too. Dr. Tony is genuinely in the business of healing people.“

    Show More

    – Ken G.

  • “Dr. T keeps me performing. I drive all the way from the city to see him. I have seen several providers over the years and I have not found anyone who spends as much time or do as much effort with me as Dr. Tony. So, thank you for all you do.“

    – Yehya E.

  1. 1
  2. 2
  3. 3
  4. 4
